meanings.sent1: The lintiest sweater I own is so fuzzy.
meanings.sent2: Her jacket was the lintiest in the entire room.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally wore my lintiest socks to the fancy dinner.
meanings.sent4: The lintiest blanket felt like a cloud of fluffiness.
meanings.sent5: The lintiest pillow was a cozy nest for the cat.

meanings.sent1: Out of all my clothes, the lintiest shirt is the blue one.
meanings.sent2: She always ends up with the lintiest pockets after doing laundry.
meanings.sent3: The lintiest corner of the room seemed to attract dust bunnies.
meanings.sent4: His lintiest hat was a magnet for stray fibers.
meanings.sent5: The lintiest towel in the bathroom was soft but not very absorbent.
